FromHSV(float, float, float)

Converts an HSV colour to a osuTK.Graphics.Color4.

public static Color4 FromHSV(float h, float s, float v)

Parameters

h float

The hue, between 0 and 360.

s float

The saturation, between 0 and 1.

v float

The value, between 0 and 1.

Returns

Color4

FromHex(string)

Converts an RGB or RGBA-formatted hex colour code into a osuTK.Graphics.Color4. Supported colour code formats:

  • RGB
  • #RGB
  • RGBA
  • #RGBA
  • RRGGBB
  • #RRGGBB
  • RRGGBBAA
  • #RRGGBBAA
public static Color4 FromHex(string hex)

Parameters

hex string

The hex code.

Returns

Color4

The osuTK.Graphics.Color4 representing the colour.

Exceptions

ArgumentException

If hex is not a supported colour code.

ToHex(Color4, bool)

Converts a osuTK.Graphics.Color4 into a hex colour code.

public static string ToHex(this Color4 colour, bool alwaysOutputAlpha = false)

Parameters

colour Color4

The osuTK.Graphics.Color4 to convert.

alwaysOutputAlpha bool

Whether the alpha channel should always be output. If false, the alpha channel is only output if colour is translucent.

Returns

string

The hex code representing the colour.
